mapper.select: select gtp.code, tw.code targetWeightCode, tw.type targetWeightType, gtp.result_code resultCode, gtp.param_code paramCode, case when gtp.param_content is null then FORMAT(erar.assess_value, 2) else gtp.param_content end paramContent from grade_template_param gtp inner join ent_risk_assess_result erar on erar.target_weight_id = gtp.target_weight_id and erar.valid = 1 inner join target_weight_grade_line twgl on twgl.id = erar.grade_line_id and gtp.result_code = twgl.result_code and twgl.valid = 1 left join target_weight tw on tw.id = twgl.target_weight_id and tw.valid = 1 where erar.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} union ALL select gtp.code, NULL targetWeightCode, NULL targetWeightType, gtp.result_code resultCode, gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where code = 'risk-level' and result_code = ( select case when risk_level = '001' then '0' else '1' end result_code from enterprise_info where id = #{enterpriseId} ) union ALL select gtp.code, NULL targetWeightCode, NULL targetWeightType, gtp.result_code resultCode, gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where code = 'R0' and result_code = ( select case when count(1) = 1 then '0' else '1' end result_code from ent_mapping_target_type where id = #{enterpriseId} ) union all select gtp.code, NULL targetWeightCode, NULL targetWeightType, gtp.result_code resultCode, gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where code = 'R1' and result_code = ( select case when count(1) = 2 then '0' else '1' end result_code from grade_template_param gtp inner join ent_risk_assess_result erar on erar.target_weight_id = gtp.target_weight_id and erar.valid = 1 inner join target_weight_grade_line twgl on twgl.id = erar.grade_line_id and gtp.result_code = twgl.result_code and twgl.valid = 1 inner join target_weight tw on tw.id = twgl.target_weight_id and tw.valid = 1 where erar.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and tw.code = 'R1' and gtp.result_code = 'low' and gtp.code in ('R1-g-level', 'R1-s-level') ) union all select gtp.code, NULL targetWeightCode, NULL targetWeightType, gtp.result_code resultCode, gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where code = 'R3' and result_code = ( select case when count(1) = 2 then '0' else '1' end result_code from grade_template_param gtp inner join ent_risk_assess_result erar on erar.target_weight_id = gtp.target_weight_id and erar.valid = 1 inner join target_weight_grade_line twgl on twgl.id = erar.grade_line_id and gtp.result_code = twgl.result_code and twgl.valid = 1 inner join target_weight tw on tw.id = twgl.target_weight_id and tw.valid = 1 where erar.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and tw.code = 'R3' and gtp.result_code = 'low' and gtp.code in ('R3-g-level', 'R3-s-level') )

select gtp.code, gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasGradualRisk' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when count(1) = 2 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_mapping_target_type where ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and valid = 1 ) union ALL select gtp.param_code, gtp.param_content from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasIntensiveTable' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when risk_level = '002' then 1 else 0 end riskLevel from enterprise_info where id = #{enterpriseId} and valid = 1 )

select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'entHappened' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S180' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S180' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'locationHappened' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S183' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S183' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'entExisted' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S171' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S171' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'involvedRiskMaterial' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code in ('S249', 'S255') and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result in ('腐蚀性','毒性','易燃易爆性','辐射性','感染性') union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code in ('S249', 'S255') and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result in ('涉水性') ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasHighPressureDevice' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >0 then 1 else 0 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code in ('S6', 'S56', 'S11', 'S61') and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result >= 9.8 union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code in ('S7', 'S57', 'S12', 'S62') and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result >= 510 ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'unloadInvolved' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S155' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S155' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasSafeBasin' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S190' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S190' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'autoInBasin' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S192' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S192' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasCofferdam' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S196' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S196' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasStorage' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S162' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '永久储存场所' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S162' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '临时储存场所' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasAlarmSystem' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S130' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S130' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'professionalHandled' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S169' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S169' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'empSpecify' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S140' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S140' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasHospital' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S221' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S221' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasSchool' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S220' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S220' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasCommunity' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S222' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S222' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasFarm' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S231' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'S231' and plan.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} and result = '否' ) a )

select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasCleaned' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) = 110 then 3 when sum(total) = 100 then 2 when sum(total) = 1 then 1 else 0 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 100 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M48' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M49' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M50' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result = '是' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'involvedRiskMaterial' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M56' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result in ('腐蚀性','毒性','易燃易爆性','辐射性','感染性') union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M56' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result in ('涉水性') ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasBigFarm' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when sum(total) >= 10 then 1 when sum(total) >= 0 then 0 else 2 end from ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 10 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M53' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result = '是' union ALL select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M53' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result = '否' ) a ) union ALL select gtp.param_code paramCode, gtp.param_content paramContent from grade_template_param gtp where gtp.code = 'hasIllegal' and gtp.result_code = ( select case when count(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end total from ent_survey_result result left join ent_survey_plan plan on plan.id = result.survey_plan_id left join survey_item si on si.id = plan.survey_item_id where si.code = 'M51' and plan.ent_id = '3b0d6013850f4dc4a8679bf842de9342' and result > 0 )
